titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to clarify the classification of laser light sources for semiconductor manufacturing.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/16/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to specify the classification for certain laser light sources for semiconductor manufacturing.
